title: Account Management test 2/3
description: Knowledge test for newly-hired Account Managers - to be passed after 2nd week at Netguru (as stated in the Mentoring Checklist)

published_attributes.title: Knowledge test for newly-hired Account Managers - to be passed after 2nd week at Netguru
published_attributes.serialized_body:
The test will check your knowledge from the Mentoring Checklist materials added until the end of week 2. This is 2nd part of the test. You need 80% to pass; if you don't suceed, you will have one option to try again. Good luck!

More than one answer per question could be applicable!

blocks.text: The test will check your knowledge from the Mentoring Checklist materials added until the end of week 2. This is 2nd part of the test. You need 80% to pass; if you don't suceed, you will have one option to try again. Good luck!

published_attributes.title: What kind of discount would you use in the following scenario: "Your project needs urgent help from another developer, the client has no money, and there’s a developer with skills needed on the bench with no project scheduled. SDM and Engineering Manager agree for a discount."

draft_attributes.title: What kind of discount would you use in the following scenario: "Your project needs urgent help from another developer, the client has no money, and there’s a developer with skills needed on the bench with no project scheduled. SDM and Engineering Manager agree for a discount."

answers.body: Extra charge on the invoice discount

published_attributes.title: What kind of discount would you use in the following scenario: "We would like to invite a junior dev to a commercial project and the client is not willing to pay for such a support. Netguru believes it is a worthwhile investment in junior roles to let them work on commercial projects. The junior rate was introduced in the Salesforce assignment but a discount “Netguru Investment” is added to log it."

answers.body: Extra charge on the invoice discount

draft_attributes.title: What kind of discount would you use in the following scenario: "We would like to invite a junior dev to a commercial project and the client is not willing to pay for such a support. Netguru believes it is a worthwhile investment in junior roles to let them work on commercial projects. The junior rate was introduced in the Salesforce assignment but a discount “Netguru Investment” is added to log it."

answers.body: Ask PMO to create unbillable assignment for the period of handover
Bill the client for handover but then create a discount for that period
No need to do anything - the system will take care of that itself
